æ˜¨å¤©çœ‹äº†66th grammyï¼Œ ä»Šå¤©åˆå›é¡¾äº†å‰é¢çš„å¥½å¤šå±Šï¼š

"The Heart Part 5"

lyrics 
As I get a little older I realize life is perspective
And my perspective may differ from yours
I wanna say thank you to everyone that's been down with me
All my fans all my beautiful fans
Anyone who's ever gave me a listen all my people
I come from a generation of pain where murder is minor
Rebellious and Margielas that trip you for designer
Belt buckles and clout overzealous if prone to violence
Make the wrong turn be a wheel of the will alignment
Residue burned missed at a inner-city
Miscommunication to keep homo' detective busy
No protection is risky
Desensitized I vandalized pain covered up and camouflaged
Get used to hearin' arsenal rain
Analyze risk your life take the charge
Homies done f**ked your baby mama once you hit the yard that's culture
Twenty-three hour lockdown that somebody caused
Said your lil' nephew was shot down the culture's involved
I done seen n***as do seventeen hit the halfway house
Get out and get his brains blown out lookin' to buy some w**d
Car wash is played out new GoFundMe accounts'll proceed
A brand-new victim'll shatter those dreams the culture
I want I want I want I want
But I want you to want me too
I want I want I want I want
I want the hood come on here babe
I want I want I want I want
I want the hood
Look what I done for you
Look what I done for you
Look what I done for you
I said I do this for my culture
To let y'all know what a n***a look like in a bulletproof Rover
In my mama's sofa was a doo doo popper
Head trigger walk up closer ain't no photoshoppin'
Friends bipolar grab you by your pockets
No option if you froze up always play the offense
N***as goin' to work and sellin' work late for work
Workin' late prayin' for work but you don't paperwork
That's the culture point the finger promote ya
Remote location witness protection they gon' hold ya
The streets got me f**ked up y'all can miss me
I wanna represent for us
New revolution was up and movin'
I'm in Argentina wiping my tears full of confusion
Water in between us another peer's been executed
History repeats again
Make amends then find a n***a with the same skin to do it
But that's the culture crack a bottle
Hard to deal with the pain when you're sober
By tomorrow we forget the remains we start over
That's the problem
Our foundation was trained to accept whatever follows
Dehumanize insensitive
Scrutinize the way we live for you and I
Enemies shook my hand I can promise I'll meet you
In a land where no equal is your equal
Never say I ain't told ya nah
In the land where hurt people hurt more people
F**k callin' it culture
I want I want I want I want
But I want you to want me too
I want I want I want I want
I want the hood come on here babe
I want I want I want I want
I want the hood
Look what I done for you
Look what I done for you
Look what I done for you
Take the drums out
Phew phew
Phew phew
Phew phew
Celebrate new life when it come back around
The purpose is in the lessons we learnin' now
Sacrifice personal gain over everything
Just to see the next generation better than ours
I wasn't perfect the skin I was in I truly suffered
Temptation and patience everything that the body nurtures
I felt the good I felt the bad and I felt the worry
But all in all my productivity had stayed urgent
Face your fears always knew that I would make it here
Where the energy is magnified and persevered
Consciousness is synchronized and crystal clear
Euphoria is glorified and made His
Reflectin' on my life and what I done
Paid dues made rules change outta love
Them same views made schools change curriculums
But didn't change me starin' down the barrel of the gun
Should I feel resentful
Had to see my full potential
Should I feel regret about the good that I was into
Everything is everything this ain't coincidental
I woke up that morning with more heart to give you
As I bleed through the speakers feel my presence
To my brother to my kids I'm in Heaven
To my mother to my sis I'm in Heaven
To my father to my wife I am serious this is Heaven
To my friends make sure you countin' them blessings
To my fans make sure you make them investments
And to the killer that sped up my demise
I forgive you just know your soul's in question
I seen the pain in your pupil when that trigger had squeezed
And though you did me gruesome I was surely relieved
I completed my mission wasn't ready to leave
But fulfilled my days my Creator was pleased
I can't stress how I love y'all
I don't need to be in flesh just to hug y'all
The memories recollect just because y'all
Celebrate me with respect
The unity we protect is above all
And Sam I'll be watchin' over you
Make sure my kids watch all my interviews
Make sure you live all the dreams we produce
Keep that genius in your brain on the move
And to my neighborhood let the good prevail
Make sure them babies and their leaders outta jail
Look for salvation when troubles get real
'Cause you can't help the world until you help yourself
And I can't blame the hood the day that I was killed
Y'all had to see it that's the only way to feel
And though my physical won't reap the benefits
The energy that carry on emits still
I want you

Mother I Sober

é™ªä¼´æˆ‘è®¸å¤šåˆç¡èµ·æ¥é€šè¡Œçš„æ—¶åˆ»ï¼Œå¯å‘æˆ‘å¾ˆå¤šæ€è€ƒï¼Œå‰å¥ä»¤äººèˆ’å¿ƒåˆå¼ºæœ‰åŠ›ï¼Œæ­Œè¯æ›´è¯‰è¯´ç€è®¸å¤šçš„æ•…äº‹ï¼Œmade me feel related, my peole.

lyrics 
I'm sensitive, I feel everything, I feel everybody
One man standin' on two words, heal everybody
Transformation, then reciprocation, karma must return
Heal myself, secrets that I hide, buried in these words
Death threats, ego must die, but I let it purge
Pacify, broken pieces of me, it was all a blur
Mother cried, put they hands on her, it was family ties
I heard it all, I should've grabbed a gun, but I was only five
I still feel it weighin' on my heart, my first tough decision
In the shadows clingin' to my soul as my only critic
Where's my faith? Told you I was Christian, but just not today
I transformed, prayin' to the trees, God is taking shape
My mother's mother followed me for years in her afterlife
Starin' at me on back of some buses, I wake up at night
Loved her dearly, traded in my tears for a Range Rover
Transformation, you ain't felt grief 'til you felt it sober

I wish I was somebody
Anybody but myself
Ooh, I wish I was somebody
Anybody but myself

I remember lookin' in the mirror knowin' I was gifted
Only child, me for seven years, everything for Christmas
Family ties, they accused my cousin, "Did he touch you, Kendrick?"
Never lied, but no one believed me when I said "He didn't"
Frozen moments, still holdin' on it, hard to trust myself
I started rhymin', copin' mechanisms to lift up myself
Talked to my lawyer, told me not to be so hard on myself
He has an aura, I hope to achieve, if I find some help
Congratulations, made it to be famous, still I feel uneasy
Water watchin', live my life in nature, only thing relieves me
Spirit guide whisper in my ear, tell me that she sees me
"Did he touch you?" I said "No" again, still they didn't believe me
Mother's brother said he got revenge for my mother's face
Black and blue, the image of my queen that I can't erase
'Til this day can't look her in the eyes, pain is takin' over
Blame myself, you never felt guilt 'til you felt it sober

I wish I was somebody
Anybody but myself
Ooh, I wish I was somebody
Anybody but myself

I was never high, I was never drunk, never out my mind
I need control, they handed me some smoke, but still I declined
I did it sober sittin' with myself, I went through all emotions
No dependents, except for one, let me bring you closer
Intoxicated, there's a lustful nature that I failed to mention
Insecurities that I project, sleepin' with other women
Whitney's hurt, the purest soul I know, I found her in the kitchen
Askin' God, "Where did I lose myself? And can it be forgiven?"
Broke me down, she looked me in my eyes, "Is there an addiction?"
I said "No," but this time I lied, I knew that I can't fix it
Pure soul, even in her pain, know she cared for me
Gave me a number, said she recommended some therapy
I asked my momma why she didn't believe me when I told her "No"
I never knew she was violated in Chicago, I'm sympathetic
Told me that she feared it happened to me, for my protection
Though it never happened, she wouldn't agree
Now I'm affected, twenty years later trauma has resurfaced
Amplified as I write this song, I shiver 'cause I'm nervous
I was five, questioning myself, 'lone for many years
Nothing's wrong, just results on how them questions made me feel
I made it home, seven years of tour, chasin' manhood
But Whitney's gone, by time you hear this song, she did all she could
All those women gave me superpowers, what I thought I lacked
I pray our children don't inherit me and feelings I attract
A conversation not bein' addressed in Black families
The devastation, hauntin' generations and humanity
They raped our mothers, then they raped our sisters
Then they made us watch, then made us rape each other
Psychotic torture between our lives we ain't recovered
Still livin' as victims in the public eyes who pledge allegiance
Every other brother has been compromised
I know the secrets, every other rapper sexually abused
I see 'em daily buryin' they pain in chains and tattoos
So listen close before you start to pass judgement on how he move
Learn how he cope, whenever his uncle had to walk him from school
His anger grows deep in misogyny
This is post-traumatic Black families and a sodomy, today is still active
So I set free myself from all the guilt that I thought I made
So I set free my mother all the hurt that she titled shame
So I set free my cousin, chaotic for my mother's pain
I hope Hykeem made you proud 'cause you ain't die in vain
So I set free the power of Whitney, may she heal us all
So I set free our children, may good karma keep them with God
So I set free the hearts filled with hatred, keep our bodies sacred
As I set free all you abusers, this is transformation

I wish I was somebody
Anybody but myself
Ooh, I wish I was somebody
Anybody but myself

You did it, I'm proud of you
You broke a generational curse
Say "Thank you, dad"
Thank you, daddy, thank you, mommy, thank you, brother
Mr. Morale

Before I go in fast asleep, love me for me
I bare my soul and now we're free

N95

Totally changed my life. My peole. ğŸ˜æ¯ä¸€å¥è¯éƒ½ä¼šæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”µå½±ï¼Œäº¦æˆ–æ˜¯ä¸€æœ¬ä¹¦ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæ•…äº‹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªåœºæ™¯â€¦â€¦ğŸ‘‘

Sometimes, conversing with certain individuals feels like they've already outputted a book in our brief exchanges. The richness and depth of these interactions are astonishing, as if every short conversation contains a wealth of information and insights, akin to someone having already conveyed the contents of a book. Such exchanges may stem from the profound insights, extensive knowledge, or unique life experiences of the other person, allowing them to convey rich information and thoughts in a short amount of time. These conversations are often inspirational, prompting individuals to think and learn more.

I want to be friends with people like this. By the way, it seems difficult to talk to random people walking on the street; people can be cold nowadays.ğŸ˜¤

lyrics 
Hello, new world, all the boys and girls
I got some true stories to tell
You're back outside, but they still lied
Woah-oh-oh-oh (Yeah)

Take off the foo-foo, take off the clout chase, take off the Wi-Fi
Take off the money phone, take off the car loan, take off the flex and the white lies
Take off the weird-ass jewelry, I'ma take ten steps, then I'm taking off top five
Take off them fabricated streams and them microwave memes, it's a real world outside (Take that shit off)
Take off your idols, take off the runway, I take off to Cairo (Take that shit off)
Take off to Saint-Tropez, five-day stay, take a quarter mill', hell, if I know (Take that shit off)
Take off the front flag, take off perception, take off the cop with the eye patch (Take that shit off)
Take off the unloyal, take off the unsure, take off decisions I lack (Take it off)
Take off the fake deep, take off the fake woke, take off the, "I'm broke, I care" (Take it off)
Take off the gossip, take off the new logic that if I'm rich, I'm rare (Take it off)
Take off the Chanel, take off the Dolce, take off the Birkin bag
(Take it off)
Take all that designer bullshit off, and what do you have?

Bitch, huh, huh, ugh
You ugly as fuck (You outta pocket)
Huh, two ATMs (Hah, hah, hah, hah)
You steppin' or what? (You outta pocket, huh)
Who you think they talk about?
Talk about us (You outta pocketâ€”shoot, shoot, shoot)
Who you think they copy off? (Brrt, brrt, brrt, brrt)
Copy off us (Get back in pocket)

The world in a panic, the women is stranded, the men on a run
The prophets abandoned, the law take advantage, the market is crashin', the industry wants
Niggas and bitches to sleep in a box while they makin' a mockery followin' us
This ain't Monopoly, watchin' for love, this ain't monogamy, y'all gettin' fucked
Jumpin' on what the hell is that? I gotta relax when I feel (Huh, facts)
All my descendants, they come in my sleep and say I am too real (Huh, facts)
I'm done with the sensitive, takin' it personal, done with the black and the white, the wrong and the right
You hopin' for change and clericals, I know the feelings that came with burial's cries

Bitch, huh, huh, ugh
You ugly as fuck (You outta pocket)
Huh, two ATMs (Hah, hah, hah, hah)
You steppin' or what? (You outta pocket, huh)
Who you think they talk about?
Talk about us (You outta pocketâ€”shoot, shoot, shoot)
Who you think they copy off? (Brrt, brrt, brrt, brrt)
Copy off us

Servin' up a look, dancin' in a drought
Hello to the big stepper, never losin' count
Ventin' in the safe house
Ventin' in the saâ€”

Can I vent all my truth? I got nothin' to lose, I got problems and pools, I can swim on my faith
Cameras movin' whenever I'm movin', the family suin' whatever I make
Murder is stackin', the president actin', the government taxin' my funds in the bank
Homies attracting the feds when I'm bracking, look at my reaction, my pupils on skates (Hold up, hold up)
Let's think about this for a second (Let's go)
Tell me what you would do for aesthetic (Let's go)
Would you sell your soul on credit? (Let's go)
Would you sell your bro for leverage? (Let's go)
Where the hypocrites at?
What community feel they the only ones relevant? (Let's go)
Where the hypocrites at?
What community feel they the only ones relevant? (Let's go)

Huh, huh, ugh
You outta pocket, yeah, you outta pocket (This shit hard)
You entertain the mediocre, need to stop it (This shit hard)
You entertainin' old friends when they toxic (This shit hard)
What your life like? Bullshit and gossip (This shit hard)
What the fuck is cancel culture, dawg?
Say what I want about you niggas, I'm like Oprah, dawg
I treat you crackers like I'm Jigga, watch, I own it all
Oh, you worried 'bout a critic? That ain't protocol (Bitch)

KENDRICK LAMAR Wins Best Rap Album For â€˜MR. MORALE & THE BIG STEPPERSâ€™ | 2023 GRAMMYs

â†©ï¸
speechï¼š

Kendrick Lamar has taken home three awards: Best Rap Album for Mr Morale and The Big Steppers, and Best Rap Performance and Best Rap Song for â€œThe Heart Part 5.â€

â€œI wanna thank my fans for trusting me with these words. As artists, weâ€™re all entertainers, and we say things to provoke thoughts and feelings and emotions, so making this record, this was one of my toughest records to make,â€ Kendrick said in his acceptance speech for Best Rap Album (after being introduced by Cardi B). â€œGoing back and thinking about where I started with rap and how far itâ€™s came, I would like to thank the culture for allowing me to evolve and be able to make a song like â€˜Mother I Sober.â€™ All we ever wanted was to be able to be the biggest underground artist of all time, and I finally found imperfection with this album.â€

è¿™æ¬¡æ›´è€ç»ƒæˆç†Ÿï¼Œæ„æ–™ä¹‹ä¸­ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æƒŠå–œæˆ–è€…è¯´å¾ˆå¤šinspirational wordsï¼Œa working man, a decent man. People you admire seem to be very similarï¼Œ Leo Messi, Ed Sheeran, Stephen Curry, Kyrie Irving and Kendrick Lamar... They don't talk a lot via social media platforms, mainly because they barely have time to do so, I guess. Let your work speak for yourself, and do what you want, do it decently. Following I'll use the word--we: We all have that same mentality inside, and we share a lot of personalities. Don't get over-attracted by the outside world, eye on what you do, and keep that attitude, let's go.

My people, my people~

Defination of what a artist is. A lot of work need to be done. Go for sth great&spiritual. Era changer.

When he took the stage, he was dressed plainly and carried himself like an ordinary person, which stood starkly in contrast to the affectations and performances of everyone before and after him. As people often say, the world is like a stage play. Everyone wears masks as they move, perform, and live. Therefore, in such circumstances, those who genuinely strive to pursue their dreams appear out of place, seem naive, and even inferior in status.

You'll Never Walk Alone.

Thomas Frank

Hey there!

This is a super quick email, in which I want to ask you a question:

If you wish you read more books, what's keeping you from doing that?

If you have a second, reply to this email and let me know.

Hi, honestly my passion for reading comes from time to time, maybe it's just due to my time spent on other things. 
Sometimes I read a lot in a day, and I also read ten pages in a week...I wish I could read more books if my time were permitted. 
1st, I love that cozy and quiet atmosphere. 
Reading around this kind of environment makes me feel connected with nature. 
2nd, certain themed books also interest me in exploring more about this cosmos, like "Out of Africa" by Karen Blixen. 
3rd, there's an old saying that goes:  It is better to travel ten thousand miles than to read ten thousand books. 
we call it è¯»ä¸‡å·ä¹¦ï¼Œè¡Œä¸‡é‡Œè·¯in Chinese.(uh originally it's a Chinese saying). But it was translated in the wrong way. 
Life is a long road to take, and along the way, the more books I read,  the more I feel I'm flawed as a human being. 
4th last but not least, reading satisfies my curiosity, like Malcolm X said 'My alma mater was books, a good library..... could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity.'

Best regards
Bruno Leopold

On July 4, 1776, the Continental Congress declared the thirteen American colonies as independent states, no longer part of the British Empire. In the year 1849, a significant event unfolded as people from the eastern part of America embarked on their journey westward, driven by the prospect of striking gold. This historical phenomenon, known as the Gold Rush, has often been reminiscent of the themes depicted in Jack London's novel, "Love of Life."

During the Gold Rush, droves of individuals, known as prospectors, flocked to the western regions of the country, particularly California, in search of newfound wealth and fortune.

To perform both the AI and physics-based calculations, the team used Microsoftâ€™s Azure Quantum Elements, which provides access to a cloud-based supercomputer tailored for chemistry and materials science research.

The project, Baker says, is an example of a practice known in tech circles as â€œeating your own dog food,â€ in which a company uses its own product to confirm that it works. In the future, he says he hopes others will pick up the tool and use it for a variety of scientific endeavors.

Don't getting easily triggered by words

UFC 297, another quite unique event, features the very unconventional and unorthodox defensive styles of the two men involved in the main event. Plus, it's the first pay-per-view event of 2024, which will be a stunning year for the UFC, thanks to the highly anticipated UFC 300. The middleweight champ, Sean Strickland, always defends himself with a Philly shell. And this time, the challenger vying for his belt also possesses a unique defense and offense style. Quite honestly, the styles may seem ugly and silly, but in the end, it has been proven that they are efficient enough to win a belt, so I guess it works and is okay to do so.

"Philly shell" is a defensive boxing stance or strategy that is associated with fighters from Philadelphia, hence the name. This defensive technique involves holding the lead hand low and close to the body, positioning the shoulder to protect the chin, and using head movement to slip and dodge punches. The rear hand is typically held higher to provide additional protection. Fighters utilizing the Philly shell rely on quick reflexes, upper body movement, and counter-punching to evade attacks while creating opportunities to launch their own offensive moves. It's a distinctive and often effective defensive style that has been employed by various successful boxers, contributing to its recognition in the world of combat sports.

LIVE FEELINGS:

  • Two men involved in the main event definitely showed their true abilities on striking ,defence and ground-game skills. DDP definitely deserves the championship, from perspective on skills and mentality of a champion. What can be easily tell from the game is that conventional striking skills is less useful when it comes to facing a Philly shell style defence, so you need to do some unusual explosive and aggressive Stand-up Striking, including some haymaker and combos. Those would be more effective. And I deeply believe that except Alex none of others in this division can settle these two fighters whom posess unbelievable power in hands and exceptional stand-up skills.

JRE live on youtube channel, taking on UFC 297 main card.

ä½™åï¼šæ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•è‰ºæœ¯å½¢å¼èƒ½å’ŒéŸ³ä¹ç›¸æ¯”ã€‚åº”è¯¥è¯´ï¼ŒéŸ³ä¹å’Œå°è¯´éƒ½æ˜¯å™è¿°ç±»çš„ä½œå“ï¼Œä¸å°è¯´çš„å™è¿°ç›¸æ¯”ï¼ŒéŸ³ä¹çš„å™è¿°éœ€è¦æ›´å¤šçš„ç¥ç§˜ä½“éªŒï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯éŸ³ä¹çš„å¬ä¼—åº”è¯¥æ¯”å°è¯´çš„è¯»è€…æ›´å¤šä¸€ç‚¹å¤©èµ‹ã€‚

Releasing a blog brings me a sense of relief! Writing and sharing thoughts through a blog can be a therapeutic and fulfilling experience.

The act of creating content and putting it out into the world can be empowering, providing a sense of accomplishment and a way to contribute to a broader conversation.

Remember that the blogging journey is a continuous process, and each post is an opportunity for self-expression and growth. Whether you're writing for yourself or for an audience, the act of sharing your thoughts and experiences can be both cathartic and meaningful.

Thanks for being an insider till the end!
Till next , stay safe and stay hydrated!

entry.title: EKL 291
entry.summary:
Keywords

  • BMF on the line
  • Love this world
  • It's all about perseverance
  • wild wild world
entry.content:
Keywords

  • BMF on the line
  • Love this world
  • It's all about perseverance
  • wild wild world

TOC

    • Keywords
  • TOC
  • ğŸ‘‘ Fighters coldğŸ˜¤

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters coldğŸ˜¤

â†©ï¸

My first time watching fights at this new district: El 291 card was so wild. With DP&JG leading the main-event, we've all expected these kind of crazy scenes before. And that's exactly how it going.
KOPYLOV landed a head shot on RIBEIRD. Yeah, we can call the salt lake city as head-shot-dead city! HSDC!

FERGUSON and CHIESA were submitted by GREEN and HOLLAND individually. But the entrance song of Tony was still exciting and enjoyable, much attention and hit around the whole stadium. 'La Ladies and gentlemen, the party has just begun.'

LEWISM opened the first round with a upknee to DE LIMA, and destroyed the latter immediately, soon he finished the fight and leaving with the most KO record in the UFC history.

The co-main event was between Alex Pereira and JanBÅ‚achowicz. The cheering sound 'Let's go Alex' was extremely loud around the whole arena. The 1st round was awfully boring. After a hard-effort takedown, Jan controlled his opponent on the ground and totally made 2 submission attempts without much damage caused. During the 2nd and the last round, both on the feet tried to land more strikes, but Alex was the more active one, landed more shots on body and legs, even though Jan got takedowns and controlled him on the ground for some time. I'd been tremendously neverous since the second round. Cause I thought if Alex wants to win the fight without uncertainty, he needed to knock Jan out within 3 rounds. As time ticking, I was worried about how would the decision goes finally. In the end, Alex won by split decision, which makes sense for me. Like DC said right after the fight finished: 'I would say that Alex win the fight.' As a matter of fact, there're couple of takedowns got by Jan, who controlled his opponent for some time, but no too much effective damage made, instead his face was with blood. All in all, the fight was close though.

It's timmmmmmmeeeee!!!!!

  • The stage for the main event--BMF title was absolutely stunning and unique. I love these two fighters so much, either of them down would make my day awful. But let's fooking go then!

I don't know what's the name of Justin's walkout song, but I can't be more familiar with Dustin's 'The Boss'. It's just meant to be a dog fight...

The intensive first round looked normal at this most entertaining division--- lightweight. But still, two warriors landed some heavy kicks and jabs, the round was extremely close.
The second round was unforgettable in my life. Right after I post a pic on my ins' story for proving I was witnessing this historical moment in my life, 'The highlight' landed a huge head shot around Dustin's left shoulder. And 'The diamond' went down on the ground. My face was like this 'ğŸ˜¨' , it's so so surreal. I don't want this and I don't believe it.

And your BMF-

We're still young!


â€œAnd I know this world is so cold and deceiving, 
but I keep my head up like my nose is bleeding.â€

Till next , stay safe and stay hydrated!

entry.title: EKL Chaos 1264
entry.summary:
Keywords

  • Baseline removal
  • Smooth
  • curvilinear integral
    • Simpson rule
    • Trapezoidal rule
  • Application background: XRD, DEMSâ€¦
entry.content:
Keywords

  • Baseline removal
  • Smooth
  • curvilinear integral
    • Simpson rule
    • Trapezoidal rule
  • Application background: XRD, DEMSâ€¦

TOC

    • Keywords
  • TOC
  • EKL Chaos 1264
    • 1ï¸âƒ£import and load data (smooth is defined):
    • 2ï¸âƒ£make comparison of 3 different results:
    • 3ï¸âƒ£'Baseline removal' explained
    • 4ï¸âƒ£'Smooth' : What's the most proper number for a WindowSize?
    • 5ï¸âƒ£ curvilinear integral
    • 6ï¸âƒ£Conclusion

EKL Chaos 1264

â†©ï¸
Let's get right to the topic. In order to show the data you got in a eye-catching and clear way, some pretreatments need to be done first.
Present characterization technologies mainly show the results of tests by catching signal. And those signal of samples are commonly composed of noise , signal of the sample itself and signal of the sample table (or the machine). For removing invalid information as much as possible, some signal processing methods have to be implemented. 'Baseline removal' and 'Smooth' are two of them.

Here's the entire process:

  • load the data --- txt file.
    • you can plot it first to see whether the characteristic peaks are clear or not.
    • do the Baseline removal.
    • smooth the line.
    • mark the peaks and label them.

1ï¸âƒ£import and load data (smooth is defined):

â†©ï¸

Figure 1

2ï¸âƒ£make comparison of 3 different results:

â†©ï¸

Figure 2

Figure 3

3ï¸âƒ£'Baseline removal' explained

â†©ï¸
There are many ways to remove the baseline, and the simple one is to average it. There're already the library that you can import directly---'BaselineRmoval'. Sometimes at certain positions, signal is quite high than other positions around. And it's possibly caused by the sample table or the substances ain't belong to the sample.

4ï¸âƒ£'Smooth' : What's the most proper number for a WindowSize?

â†©ï¸
As you can see in Figure 1, there's a variable needed to be defined---WindowSize. As its name implies, there's a window for the smooth process. So how can we define it to get the job done properly? Therefore, we digged the answer here:

  • We defined the different scale of windowsizes and the length of the data: len(x)=2751

    Figure 4

  • Here're plots that we got:

    • [1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15,17]


Figure 5 WindowSize=[1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15,17]

  • [1,7,15,33,67,135,275,555,1001]


Figure 6 WindowSize=[1,7,15,33,67,135,275,555,1001]

As you can clearly see in the plots above, the quite big windowsizes smooth the line too much to get all the right information-- peaks. However, when the number goes small, it seems that results are not widely different from each other.

5ï¸âƒ£ curvilinear integral

â†©ï¸
Sometimes the squals of the area in the plot need to be calculated. There're two main methods out there.

  • Simpson rule
  • Trapezoidal rule


    Figure 7 curvilinear integral code&results

6ï¸âƒ£Conclusion

â†©ï¸

  • 'Baseline removal' is extremely simple. Just import and apply it.
  • In terms of 'Smooth' , the number of the WindowSize matters. It's somthing to do with the scale of the data you process. Bur remember don't set it too big. 3, 5, 7 are recommended. Even though don't forget to compare the results to the original one eventrually, in case you lost some infomation which is quite of importance.

Till next , stay safe and stay hydrated!

entry.title: EKL 290
entry.content:
Keywords

  • GOAT's debut
  • New chapter
  • P4P King
  • DDP tornado

TOC

    • Keywords
  • TOC
  • ğŸ‘‘ Fighters
  • â˜•Gooddays
    • ğŸ“—PaperReadingï¼š

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters

â†©ï¸
I can go through this uhh. On july 9th, during the offical UFC fight week, Alex Volk lead the UFC 290 fight card, which could be the most exciting & unforgettable card for this year. After a loss to light weight champion-Islam Makhachev, this time the P4P king, 'The Great' has to unite the feather weight belt against the new interium champion Yair RodrÃ­guez whom got the interium belt at the same night Alex chanllenging Islam. I need to emphases here that Yair remade his belt into a colorful and more fantastic one.

Quite surprisingly, Alex dominated the fight and finished Yair. And even more impressively, once again the assassin baby lost by split decision. It seems that his loss during these years was all by the split decision. Judges are not friendly to him lol. Personally, itâ€™s a pity for me, and it made my day awful. BTW, the day I leave home for the new chapter.
Alright, we move on to the middleweight bout between Robert Whittaker and Dricus Du Plessis, absolutely a dog fight. Again, DDPâ€™s performance couldnâ€™t be more perfect. He finished the opponent in R2 and began with a massive punch right in the face. I told you, although thereâ€™re a lot of people who mocked his skills and said he won fights with luck mainly. It can be meant that heâ€™s a decent guy, not much different from other ones. Everyone is here to chase belts, thatâ€™s all. Potentially the next title contender. Look at this, lmao.

For your lightweight bout, Jalin Turner along with Dan Hooker put on a show with fireworks. Both were hurt severely. Additionally, Bo Nickal once again destroyed his opponent in the early first round. His ability is still unpredictable.

â˜•Gooddays

â†©ï¸
The one and only---Leo Messi made his debut for InterMiami, and scored a freekick to win the match in the final seconds. Perfect timing and angle of the kick. Btw, there were many superstars in the stadium that night.

  • See? Everything is just fine. Take your time.

ğŸ“—PaperReadingï¼š

â†©ï¸

  • We split once again.

  • We good.

  • Something newww!

  • And lessons are learned:

    • "Seize the day"

        Great quote from Dustin Poirier.
â€œA fight isnâ€™t a fight til thereâ€™s something to overcomeâ€. 
Love our modern day warriors!!

Till next , stay safe and stay hydrated!

entry.content:
Keywords

  • PACAåŒºåˆ«,Graduation,treble champ,darkness&loneliness,OV

TOC

  • ğŸ˜‡PACA
  • ğŸŒŒBrandenburg

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters

â†©ï¸

On June 17 2023, UFC 289 took place in Vancouver, Canada. All Canadian fighters performed perfectly and ended as 6-0. The main event was the lion Amanda Nunes versus Irene Aldana. The undisputed two-division champion won the match dominantly. As a matter of fact, I picked the latter, but Irene didnâ€™t even show her strike skills very much, she had to face the force and push from the champion. After the unsuspicious decision was read out, the UFC female queen took off the gloves and made a speech to the entire world. Sheâ€™s been a fighter for so many years, now she retires as a GOAT. She got the family and a girl by side and itâ€™s pretty enough.
The comain even was between Charles 'DoBronxs' Oliveira

An surprising and explosive accident happened on June 24, 2023, due to the unpleased manner to Russiaâ€™s Ministry of National Defense, the leader of the world most prominent mercenary army Wagner, Mr. Prigozhin, decided to attack the capital Moscow to protest. Specifically Russiaâ€™s MND was willing to incorporate mercenaries into the national army which is unfavorable for Wagner. This breaking news actually happened and ended soon with a peaceful result that the president of the Republic of Belarus Lukashenko stepped in and confirmed Prigozhin arrival in Belarus, said Wagnerites "welcome to stay here for a while, at their own expense of course". Of course, this implausible thriller looks even more surreal when you remember how he freaked out the first time Wagnerites showed up in Belarus.

â˜€ï¸TREBLE WINNERs

â†©ï¸


ä¸è¯´å¾ˆéš¾å—ï¼Œä½†ä¹Ÿè§‰å¾— ä¼šæœ‰ç§¯ææ–¹é¢çš„å¯èƒ½ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¶Šè¯´è¶Šæ‹–å…¥æ·±æ¸Š ç‹ ç‹ åœ°æ’•å¼€çš²è£‚çš„ä¼¤å£ã€‚


'loyalty'

I got, I got, I got, I got
Loyalty, got royalty inside my DNA

è™½ç„¶ä¸å–œæ¬¢è¿™æ ·ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿˜æ˜¯ä¼šè‡ªå·±å¿ä¸ä½ç¬‘ å“ˆå“ˆå“ˆå“ˆ Team Chandler leads 6-0 versus Team McGregor. LOL

hard work pays off!!! we are again the champions!!

ğŸ˜¤wait but why

â†©ï¸
I've always been doing this: a conclusive thought comes to my mind, and I try to gather as much evidence as I can to solve and describe it from all perspectives. I process this kind of thing while I'm riding my bike on my way to the canteen. Like this, Conor McGregor said in his documentary: I don't go to other places to learn from other coaches, cause you must trust your coaches, have confidence and believe their capability. In this case, I think Team Khabib is the same as Team Conor. I got a straightforward and smooth narrative in my mind nearly one hour ago, but unfortunately, I lost it. Now I possibly see it in the other way. The most important thing in fighting business is self-improvement, that's the real matter that helps you keep and defend the belt if you're a champion. What matters is what you do, rather than who coach you or how high the coaches' level are. You can learn anywhere, anyway. And of course, it takes sacrifices and pain.
Oh, I have it now: ask a quick question for Mr M, what's the name of two main parties in USA. He can't even anwser it quite straight.

ğŸ“Writing a scientific article: A step-by-step guide for beginners

â†©ï¸
A step-by-step guide for beginners

Even today, the old adage â€œpublish or perishâ€ remains valid.
However, the competition is already quite fierce amongst all the good quality papers that are submitted to journals, and it is therefore of paramount importance to get the basics right, in order for your paper to have a chance of succeeding.

  • softer tone
  • result show types: text table figure...

â˜ªï¸Newsletter Scott Young-Why Learning Still Matters

â†©ï¸
LINK

Whenever there's a new tech&product coming out, it always triggers a hot discussion on the internet. Mainly these days, people wonder whether it's necessary to learn languages "in person"? As a matter of fact, we've already used AI models to generate code for so many times, so is it vital that I could handle the code without AI? "One thing I am reasonably confident predicting, however, is that LLMs wonâ€™t make learning obsolete, " Scott Young wrote in the newsletter. He took paper writing and a calculator as examples. The saying goes, 'The palest ink is better than the best memory.' We no longer need to memorize speeches if the full text is written down. To some extent, our memory of the mind gets released. While they certainly eliminate the need to learn some skills (I have no idea how to use a slide rule, for instance), we still have to understand arithmetic to use a calculator to get the answer we seek, even if the machine does the actual computation.

Knowledge outside your head doesnâ€™t count, since it canâ€™t participate in learning and reasoning.
The ability to look something up is not a substitute for having knowledge in your head.
Understanding an LLMâ€™s answer depends heavily on the knowledge you already possess.
Your own knowledge allows you to extract knowledge from the LLM more accurately.
LLMs may accelerate the need for knowledge, since the combination of [knowledgeable person + ChatGPT] will outperform [ignorant person + ChatGPT] by a wider margin than exists between the two people on their own.

From what I can see, like generating codes by ChatGPT, it'd be better if the users are capable of reading, finding out the errors and correcting the codes.
Wait but somehow all these products which are tokens as examples are not as epoch-making as LLMs. So we can barely see it that way. Or maybe LLMs are not that epoch-making yet, we all can just see it as a new-era tool. The larger and stronger-impact AI products are in the way...

Physical labour can be replaced by AI techs definitely. But even sophisticated enough tasks like chess have already been proven that can defeat in front of AI.

In the extreme case, all bets are off. Perhaps weâ€™ll live in a utopian future where machines do all the work and people do cognitive activities for leisure or showing off, much like gardening is a hobby, not agriculture. Or perhaps weâ€™ll all get turned into paperclips. Who knows?

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters

â†©ï¸

The UFC 288 fight card was built around one of the greatest bantamweight champions--Aljamain Sterling. The undisputed belt holder has already defended his crown twice against the former champions, Peter Yan and TJ Dillashaw. Domestically the fighting style of the division's current king is not much fond by fans. POV: relatively poor stand-up skills and boring ground style. But regardless, this third title defence leads him to the achievement that being the first-ever bantamweight champion successfully defend the title 3 times consecutively. The challenger, Henry Cejudo has already harvested all the reputation a man could in this business. This also reminds me of what Pep did to Erling Haaland when the latter almost got 5 goals in one champions league match. During the shower, I thought having too fruitful awards at an early age isn't that good to be a GOAT. 3C's performance was unbelievable and those TD were fabulous from all perspectives. Aljo took down 3C several times and the former two-division champion has only been taken down once!!! Physically Aljo has much more advantages over 3C in reach length and so on. All five rounds were extremely close, but as you may already be familiar with, it won't be easy for the challenger to take away the belt. So the split win for AS is acceptable personally. Hope 3C wouldn't retire after this, cause Branden Moreno has unfinished business with him and 3C's status is good to be a contender.

The co-main event was a potential title qualifier fight between Belal Muhammad and Gilbert Burns. It seems like Burns show every weekend on the fight nights, lol. A lot of respect for him. Belal landed many leg kicks to his rival's body and head in the early two rounds. Burns tried to block with his arms partially and his left arm was uncomfortable. So it's pretty tough for "Durinho" to harm his opponent heavily. In the end, Belal Muhammad Defeats Gilbert Burns by Decision. Much respect between both.

And China power!! Yan Xiaonan was patient, and smart with some moves and hurt JÃ©ssica Andrade at the beginning of the fight. While JÃ©ssica was chasing and aiming to land some shots, Yan dodged and take a right nuclear punch to JÃ©ssica's chin. Finally, Yan won by KO for the first time in her career. More importantly winning this contender fight give her a title short, namely Chinese Derby with Zhang Weili.


Besides, a lot of stuff happened this evening.LOL
Merab â€œHoudiniâ€ Dvalishvili too quick ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ . This man had O'Malleyâ€™s jacket on in 5 seconds ğŸ˜­ #UFC288

It's not necessarily your whole lifetimeï¼Œ but certain ages around your twenties. Henry Cejudo won the Olympic gold medal in 2008 and retired from UFC as a two-division champion. BTW, the most impressive part is that with all these wars he's been through, he comes back only at 36. Today he returned for the UFC bantamweight belt which was never truly lost. Triple C lost the title fight by a split decision to Aljo Sterling, unfortunately. But okay, we trust the process! The walkout song (Lupe Fiasco - The Show Goes On) of the king reminds me of Sth. Take your time.

ğŸ“Stories never been told

â†©ï¸
Back in middle school time, we all had a lot to say to each, but it seemed time was always not enough for us. Differently, these days we realistically do not have that many words to share. Miss you. It's unimaginable to me that the days I spent with you the last summer were the last chance to see you. Unfortunately, it could be the last meeting between us under the witness of this planet. Everything looked fine at that time. Hopefully, we could bond with each till the end in another parallel universe. You're cute and stunning.

Every morning, I remember that you're really gone
I think about you every day, nothing will take this pain away

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters

â†©ï¸

Before the unique fight week, I watched the walkout live videos of Israel Adesanya again and again, and a lot of complicated emotions and feelings came into my mind. I fell into the abyss of loneliness and fear. They inspired me to be the winner of the master in several wars, but it means too much. Like death staring at me at the gate of hell, the abyss of fear, helplessness and loneliness is of course for the challenger. Like the setting sun and the foreplay of endless darkness.

Never thought the rematch between Alex&Izzy would be this dramatically unimaginable. I got a lot of words to say before this historical event. The narratives behind the fights of this two are second to none, as taking a broad view of history and future. One is the two-division belts holder, the other's legacy doesn't even need words to mention, as exactly people commented "The Battle of Ending the Valley between Naruto and Sasuke". Personally, I'm awfully blessed to watch this main event. I was with 'Poatan', the reason behind this has nothing to do with religion. He's a quite hard-worker, a man only acts, like Leo Messi and many other greats. Btw, I unfollowed some IG accounts relating the Is***. Originally, a certain page posted that in XinJiang, some kids had been forcely locked into "concentration camps". I's like wtf??? Ignorance is the one true factor under this circumstance. Don't ever easily trust someone nowadays, even when it comes to sth you could never have a doubt about. A mouth full of shit. Back to UFC 287, the first of the main event is quite equally extensive. At the beginning of the second round, Perrira landed a couple of shots on Izzy, and let the latter went back and hands up to defend the head, and at this time, the champion kept landing shots, but suddenly Izzy fought back with a punch, which made Alex cannot stand still. What's coming next is the most savage shot which landed on the temple, and Consequently, the champion fell down to ground uncautiously. Na, the most entertaining part was not over, right after the stoppage by the referee, Izzy perfromed his celebration action by fetching and shooting three arrows from his back to where Alex layed. And the next part is the interview...

'''
As I said No f**king way!!!!!
This is beyond imagination, even for a movie.
LIVE IN THE MOMENT.
Go for sth.
Izzy Adesanya with the most inspirational speech of the year:

â€œYouâ€™ll never feel this level of happiness if you donâ€™t go for somethingâ€¦when they knock you downâ€¦.when they put their foot on your neck. If you stay down, youâ€™ll never get that resolve. Fortify your mind!â€
justonetimeinyourlife
REVENGE IS SWEET

'''

Blue moon

Without a dream in my heart
Without a love of my own

[Verse 2]
Blue moon

So we circle dem endâ€™s like the letter man
Set a bomb, make a dam
Black rain fall, something must catch a man

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters

â†©ï¸

As half of a year in the making, the fight between Nigerian 'Nightmare' Kamaru Usman versus Leon 'Rocky' Edwards was held at The O2 arena in London, England. The audience put their attention mainly on 2 fights, namely co-main event and main event. The former one was between Justin 'Highlight' Gaethje and Rafael Fiziev. As we all know, Justin arguably is the most exciting performer to watch in this business nowadays, and his fighting style had earned him the most bonuses than anyone. His shows are always zealous for fans and newcomers to enjoy. Importantly, his opponent, Rafael Fiziev showed how nimble and technical he is in today's comain event. The newcomer of the lightweight division is tough and he can really take plenty of shots. To some extent, his speed may have something with his race, as Asian fighting out of Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan. The only pity for me is that his father told him if he win the game, the father would kill one sheep for the poor. I guess mainly the reason for that is Ramadan around the corner. Congrats to the brother and you can easily tell that next time, after some progress, he could get his hand raised in a title shot. No matter what comes, we just don't give up. Head up and come back ASAP.


Now on the main event, personally I can't see the influence of the headshot that the last time Leon landed on Kamaru left today. Leon showed his real level and tactics were carried out fabulously. More leg-kicks and excellent takedown defences made him retain the championship in the homecountry. The former champion didn't fight at that high level and his plans weren't selectively enough to help him get the belt back. Personally the coming fights I desired are Leon vs Colby, Kamaru vs the winner of the 'Belal vs Shavkat'. After the main fight, Kamaru said all the fighters went through a lot to be awfully prepared and perform for the fans. They definitely should get a reputation and respect. Shout out to heroes! They are fighters not only for the fans and sports but also for their family members, as a father, mother... Among the fighters, they got a lot of respect for each. Justin and Rafael showed their thoughts on that by tweeting 'It was an honour to share the cage'. Additionally, Justin is well educated by his parents and schools, and he acts and talks righteously at the same. This reminds me of the importance of knowledge and insights that humans have. Believably he has a love and wonderful family. There is something we can learn from outside the octagon. Almost forgot to say, Colby's fight is on the way. In the interview, he said he just doesn't like anyone else, who pictures the training and posts it on social media. He is bad in some ways, but you cannot deny that he's similar to big names like Leo Messi, and me. The elites do have something in common.

Life is f**king colorful for us to live in. We all fight together!

Till next , stay safe and stay hydrated!

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters

â†©ï¸

  • The Kazakhstanian fighter Shavkat Rakhmonov won over Jeff Neal via a rear naked choke. What a fabulous fight! My pick for fight of the night. Hats off to both men with their own unstoppable wills. Shavkat! 17 stoppages in a row!
  • Alexa Grasso took a back and held a positon to choke Valentina Shevchenko after the latter put a turn and kick. Unfortenately a little 'mistake' made by the multiple times champion. Alright we go and get the thing back together! Viva Mexico! Another tromendous performance from both!
  • Jon Bones Jones came back to the octagon after 3 years and won the heavyweight champion by guillotining the french Ciryl Gane at the very first round. Too dominent to watch this fight. It did't even begin. LOL
  • UFC 286 is around the corner. You'd better fight!!!!

â˜•Gooddays

â†©ï¸

  • Let's go to take a shower and finish the fights! Pride in Battle!
  • An update on my EKL paperbot:

  • Just watched some comedy shows of Eddie.Griffin (Undeniable / E-niggmaâ€¦â€¦), below is all I got in my mind after watching them. TBH, comedians like Peter Russell, all do this on the stages. Haha. It's almost like a useful and weird skill to do so. Nonetheless, I barely see Trevor Noah doing this. Personally I ascribed this to his education given by his strict family members. Overall, It's a little bit okay for me to watch these actions on account of speciality.
  • Spent some time on the court, just for relaxing myself while listening the podcast "SanYanLiangYu vol.46"on google podcast.Hosts and guests were chatting on giving gifts between lovers:'The ceremony matters seriously...' Maybe you're right one, I cannot give you the things others can give. I'm the abnormal man, not fitting for you as others. It's only tough for me to find the right one. I'm okay with that then, cuz better to lead a life that I exzert for. Wait but I realize that sometimes falling into a relationship is kinda like scientific research: do relative surveys before you get into it and then plan to handle the experiments step by step on your own. Learning is endless. Next time it's better to understand how other girls see things before diving into a relationship...

'Cause I'm movin' at God speed
Only God and my mama know what I need
And I feel the hardwood floors on my knees
As I beg you just to take it easy on me

I'm movin' at God speed

"Snow"

Hand in mine like a heaven sent hymn
Moving and shaking like the ramblers do

You bring heaven down to me

Coincidentally I saw a paper named Assessment of chemistry knowledge in large language models that generate code. What it said is that authors introduced a LLM for chemistry. > LLMs are now easily available via tools like tabnine, copilot, or ChatGPT. We have found high accuracy on chemistry questions, and it is inevitable that students and researchers will begin using these tools.
Twice pictures were post on instagram (the 129 court & anshan branch).

    As mentioned before.

Till next , stay safe and stay hydrated!

ğŸ‘‘ Fighters Countdown

â†©ï¸
On 11th Feb 2023, UFC 284 will be held in Perth, a city located in the westsouth of Australia. The final show will be brought by P4P NO.1 Alex Volkanovski and P4P NO.2 Islam Makhachev. For the former, it's a treasurable chance to hold two division's championship belts simultaneously, for the latter, the aim is to take the P4P NO.1 position from his opponent, and defend his belt for the first time.

From my point of view, I'm gonna go for Islam. Similar to Olivira, Alex had been on the edge of failure at least twice before when he defended his champion against T-City and Max's challenges. Of course Alex won the games by showing his endurance and patience, but from the opponents' view, they made mistakes or did not have the top-level choke skills to stop Alex's pace. However, notably, Alex's speed is sterlingly quick and he's flexible with his one-shot power at the same time.
